channel.title: Posts on Desmond Tuiyot
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Desmond Tuiyot

item.title: SQLAlchemy - the basics
item.description: Introduction to SQLAlchemy sQLAlchemy Thereâ€™s 3 ways of interacting with database data in SQLAlchemy: Raw SQL SQL Expression Language ORM SQLAlchemy allows developers to use pure sql, unlike other ORMs. The SQL Expression API allows us to build sql queries using Python objects and operators - it is an abstraction over pure sql and abstracts away various implementation differences between databases. The SQLAlchemy ORM is built on SQL Expression Language and allows us to associate Python classes to database tables.

item.title: An Analysis of Eminem Lyrics - NLP
item.description: Introduction I happen to be a huge Eminem fan, so his recent tweets highlighting the anniversary of his Relapse albums and organizing a Spotify listening party for his prolific The Marshall Mathers LP got me rightfully excited. Being relatively new to text mining, I decided to dive into and explore his lyrics as a means to learn and apply various text mining techniques. This post is the first of a two-part analysis; stay tuned for the second one.

item.title: Notes On Everything
item.description: Disclaimer: These are my personal notes on things I learn. They are neither extensive nor comprehensive and will probably not be useful to you. There may be a lot of mistakes and errors because this space represents my attempts at understanding the things I learn. Jump to: Javascript Front End Libraries Bootstrap jQuery localStorage Statistics Probability Machine Learning Algorithms Data Structures Python RShiny Javascript Basic Javascript Variables Basic data types : undefined, null, object, symbol, string, boolean, number Declaring : var myVarname; The undefined data type - this is the initial data type of variables that have been declared and not initialized.
